CL08.cl.missing.header.name: Invalid request. Name of the codelist is required.
CL08.cl.missing.header.master.manager: Invalid request. Main authority of codelist is mandatory.
CL08.cl.missing.header.validity: Invalid request. Validity of the codelist is required.
CL08.cl.missing.header.legislative: Invalid request. Definition of codelist legal effectiveness is required.
CL08.cl.missing.item.language: Invalid data for the codelist. Language version information missing.
CL08.cl.missing.item: Invalid data for the codelist. Name of item missing.
CL08.cl.missing.value: Invalid data for the codelist. Required item parameter is missing.
CL08.cl.missingdate.value: Fill valid and effective date codelist and his items
CL08.cl.invalid.same.languages: Invalid data for the codelist. Data defining two values of attribute valid in the same time.
CL08.cl.invalid.date.from.before.to: Invalid request. Date effective of is earlier than date effective to.
CL08.cl.invalid.date.same.fromto: Invalid request. Date effective of is similar as date effective to.
CL08.cl.invalid.date.same.from: Invalid request. Parameter includes two versions with similar date effective of.
CL08.cl.invalid.date.same.to: Invalid request. Parameter includes two versions with similar date effective to.
CL08.cl.invalid.date.overlap: Invalid request. Parameter includes value versions that overlap in time.
CL08.cl.xml.managertype.notexists: Invalid request. Authority type not defined.
CL08.cl.request.isnot.base: Invalid request. Codelist is not base codelist and as such does not need to be subject to the Committee for Standardization ISPA.
CL08.cl.request.is.base: Invalid request. Base codelist has to be subject to the Committee for Standardization ISPA.
CL08.cl.header.inappropriate.wfstate: Invalid request. Codelist is in incorrect state for particular operation.
CL08.cl.item.inappropriate.wfstate: Invalid request. Codelist item is in incorrect state for particular operation.
CL08.cl.request.not.reject.wsstate: Invalid request. Codelist with the same code or request for adding codelist with the same code already exists.
CL08.cl.request.notexists: Invalid request. Request for codelist with specified code does not exist.
CL08.cl.header.`: Invalid request. Codelist with specified code does not exist.
CL08.cl.item.notexists: Invalid request. Codelist item with specified code does not exist.
CL08.cl.header.locked: Invalid request. Codelist with specified code is locked.
CL08.cl.header.not.locked: Invalid request. Codelist with specified code is unlocked. It is not possible to perform particular operation over unlocked codelist.
CL08.cl.item.locked: Invalid request. Codelist item with specified code is locked.
CL08.cl.item.not.locked: Invalid request. Codelist item with specified code is unlocked. It is not possible to perform particular operation over unlocked codelist item.
CL08.cl.header.temporal.notexists: Invalid request. Codelist with specified code does not exist with status in-process.
CL08.cl.header.original.notexists: Invalid request. Codelist with specified code does not exist with status new.
CL08.cl.item.temporal.notexists: Invalid request. Codelist item with specified code does not exist with status in-process.
CL08.cl.item.original.notexists: Invalid request. Codelist item with specified code does not exist with status new.
CL08.cl.item.already.exists: Item with entered code already exists. Item code has to be unique.
CL08.cl.consistency.request.more.thanone: Internal error in base codelists. There are multiple versions of codelist request.
CL08.cl.consistency.temporal.exists.without.o: Internal error in base codelists. There is version in-progress of codelist without published version.
CL08.cl.permissiondenied: You are not authorized for this operation.
CL08.cl.request.codelist.exists: Invalid request. Codelist with specified code already exists.
CL08.cl.language.version.alreadyexists: Invalid request. Translation of codelist is already done.
CL08.cl.language.version.notexist: Invalid request. First it is necessary to translate codelist.
CL08.cl.language.version.default.changing: Invalid request. It is not possible to modify Slovak version of codelist.
CL08.cl.header.temporal.exists: Modified codelist version can not exist when adding a new language version.

header.generateProp1: Dear user, after click on button reference register working copy file will be generated. Register state will not be changed and also history will not contain this event. File will be stored localy on your computer. It is recommended to change it's name and location.
header.generateProp2: (If you just insert or edit reference data, we highly recommend wait a minute to save data and then confirm action.)
header.MPKheading1: Dear user, after confirmation of state change to 'Draft for MPK' file will be generated. This file is base document for MPK review process and will be stored in your computer.
header.MPKheading2: It is recommended to change its name and location.
